name: Bouncy Heroes (v1.3)
description:
The bouncy heroes are back at doing what they do best... being bouncy? and smashing evil alien beings into oblivion. Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to move around, press down (or S) to slam towards the ground. Press "SPACE or UP" when holding left or right to execute a fast dash in that direction. You can also use SPACE to quick start and return to menu, and skip the intro. P to pause game

> Let me know which character is your favourite!

> Challenge: Can you get the legend badge?

> Have an idea for a character? let me know what they

are and what their ability would be below for the chance to have them added to the game!

- Intro song "LUUDE - Don't leave me"

- Game music by "wyver9" found at newgrounds

- Sound FX created with chiptone

All art by mushy

graphic designer yuji
